DataElement.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species.  It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution._A system of numbered categories for representation of data._Participant's race based on the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) categories.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species.  It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species.  It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.

Property.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America) and who maintains tribal affiliation or community attachment. (OMB)

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America) and who maintains tribal affiliation or community attachment. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Change upper case to mixed case - DW 02-10-2016

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: African American; term used in the United States to categorize a population group comprised of persons having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa, most of whose ancestors were brought from Africa to the Americas as slaves between the sixteenth and nineteenth centuries. Includes population subgroups, e.g. Kenyan, Nigerian, or Haitian. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as described.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander: C41219

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander: C41219
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as described below.

Concepts.longName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (OMB)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.
